testcase.name: Add Product to Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to altashop homepage.........................................passed When User select the product................................................passed And User click beli button..................................................passed Then Product will added to the cart.........................................passed

testcase.name: Increasing Total Product in the Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to altashop homepage.........................................passed When User already have product in the cart..................................passed And User click plus button..................................................passed Then The ammount of product increased.......................................passed

testcase.name: Decreasing Total Product in the Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to altashop homepage.........................................passed When User already have product in the cart..................................passed And User click minus button.................................................passed Then The ammount of product decreased.......................................passed

testcase.name: Pay product from Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to altashop homepage.........................................passed When User already have product in the cart and User already logged in.......passed And User click pay button...................................................passed Then Product have been paid.................................................passed

testcase.name: Pay product from Cart 2
